page.title: 13CLUBS IN EVERCREECH
page.content:
EVERCREECH ROVERS The village football team is called the Evercreech Rovers.Average crowd is about 20.Evercreech Rovers were founded around 1900.There has always been a team in the village except during the 2 world wars.The team plays in maroon and blue.They have consistently either been winners or runners-up in the Mid-Somerset League for many years.
OTHER ORGANISATIONS There are over twenty other voluntary organisations in the area including: National Childbirth Trust,Mothers Union,Arts and Crafts Group,Friendship Club for retired folk,Royal British Legion,Ladies Trim and Fit,Mother and Toddler Club,Youth Club,W.I.,Druids.
